      • moveCharacter

        public java.util.ArrayList<Pair<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Integer>> moveCharacter(java.util.ArrayList<Pair<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Integer>> current,
                                                                                    int change)
        Description copied from class: GameCharacter
        Moves the character
        Specified by:
        moveCharacter in class GameCharacter
        Parameters:
        current - Used in case there's a need to recalculate something, such as the club, current will hold all positions which were valid after a first pass on this function
        change - Value returned by checkOverlap from GameLogic or isFree from Map, determines which part of the returned array is overlapping
        Returns:
        An array with all the positions all objects associated with the character will try to move to

      • moveClub

        private Pair<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Integer> moveClub(Pair<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Integer> pos)
        Moves the ogre club
        Parameters:
        pos - Position of the ogre
        Returns:
        Position where it should put the club (this position will then be verified)
